discovery_rule.name: UPS Test Elapsed Time
discovery_rule.description: The amount of time, in TimeTicks, since the test in progress was initiated, or, if no test is in progress, the previous test took to complete. If the value of upsTestResultsSummary is noTestsInitiated(6), upsTestElapsedTime has the value 0.

trigger_prototype.name: UPS Test status is abnormal
